title: Ontology-Based Learning Object Design and Recommendation Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and understanding of data analysis concepts
context.additional_context: Learners can collaborate in real-time and access resources via personal devices, with formative assessments provided for in-depth subject-specific learning.

learning_goals: Learners can explain ontology design principles based on the Learning Object Metadata (LOM) standard
Learners can generate three or more linkage rules between learning objects using the OWL/SWRL rule language
Learners can operate a personalized learning object recommendation system by analyzing domain knowledge graphs
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
